method City(AssetGroup group, String name, int costOfCity ,int costOfHouse, int[] rentPrices) public this is the constructor for a city in the monopoly game

Parameters:
group - - a valid non null Country which this City belongs to
name - - the name of the city
costOfCity - - a non negative integer. the buy cost of the City
costOfHouse - - a non negative integer. cost for each house built
rentPrices - - a array of size 4 were each of its cells is initilized to a non negative integer.
